title: Bug 103963: Missing friendly error message when no data for the series
OB: When there is no data for the series, the system does not provide a friendly error message as expected.
EB: The system should display a friendly error message when there is no data for the series.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the series that does not have any data.
3. Observe that there is no friendly error message displayed.
